meanings.definition: A mechanical hand or arm controlled by a person's movements.
meanings.sent1: The waldoes in the factory helped workers lift heavy objects.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used waldoes to handle dangerous chemicals safely.
meanings.sent3: The waldoes in the amusement park waved at the visitors playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her waldoes of kindness reached out to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The waldoes on the robot mimicked human gestures perfectly.

meanings.definition: A remote manipulator for handling hazardous materials.
meanings.sent1: The waldoes in the lab allowed scientists to work with dangerous substances from a safe distance.
meanings.sent2: The technician used waldoes to move radioactive materials in the containment chamber.
meanings.sent3: The waldoes in the space station danced around the toxic waste containers.
meanings.sent4: His waldoes of caution prevented any accidents during the chemical cleanup.
meanings.sent5: The waldoes on the robotic arm delicately picked up the fragile vials.
